tooltip_properties.description: You can get in and out of the seat by interacting with it using [$[action_use_seat]]. You can place a rescued survivor in any seat by using [$[action_use_seat]] while carrying them.
tooltip_properties.short_description: A small padded seat with control handlebars.

logic_node.label: Occupied
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal if the seat is occupied by a character.

logic_node.label: Trigger [$[action_trigger]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_trigger]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Look X
logic_node.description: Outputs the character look direction in turns along the X-axis.

logic_node.label: Look Y
logic_node.description: Outputs the character look direction in turns along the Y-axis.

logic_node.label: Axis 1 [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]
logic_node.description: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_left]] and [$[action_right]]. [$[action_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_right]] moves it towards 1.

logic_node.label: Axis 2 [$[action_up]]/[$[action_down]]
logic_node.description: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_up]] and [$[action_down]]. [$[action_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_up]] moves it towards 1.

logic_node.label: Axis 3 [$[action_pedal_left]]/[$[action_pedal_right]]
logic_node.description: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_pedal_left]] and [$[action_pedal_right]]. [$[action_pedal_left]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_pedal_right]] moves it towards 1.

logic_node.label: Axis 4 [$[action_throttle_up]]/[$[action_throttle_down]]
logic_node.description: Outputs a standard value between -1 and 1, controlled using [$[action_throttle_up]] and [$[action_throttle_down]]. [$[action_throttle_down]] causes the output value to move towards -1, and [$[action_throttle_up]] moves it towards 1.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 1 [$[action_hotkey_1]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_1]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 2 [$[action_hotkey_2]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_2]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 3 [$[action_hotkey_3]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_3]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 4 [$[action_hotkey_4]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_4]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 5 [$[action_hotkey_5]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_5]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Hotkey 6 [$[action_hotkey_6]]
logic_node.description: Outputs an on signal when [$[action_hotkey_6]] is held, and off when it is not.

logic_node.label: Seat data
logic_node.description: Outputs the axis, hotkey and occupied data from the seat. (On/Off 1+ : Hotkeys) (On/Off 31 : Trigger) (On/Off 32 : Occupied) (Value 1 : [$[action_left]]/[$[action_right]]) (Value 2 : [$[action_up]]/[$[action_down]]) (Value 3 : [$[action_pedal_left]]/[$[action_pedal_right]]) (Value 4 : [$[action_throttle_up]]/[$[action_throttle_down]]) (Value 9 : Look X) (Value 10 : Look Y)

logic_node.label: Headset Video
logic_node.description: Displays video UI overlay on a helmet mounted display.
